modName: Creating a Playable Race - The Next Steps
summary: This Tutorial is a sequel to Creating a Playable Race - Revised.  It deals with providing greater detail to your Custom Race.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][color=cyan][font=Times New Roman]Creating a Playable Race - The Next Steps[/font][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Putting it on the line for Real Life, please view and "Like" my first documentaries.  I hope you enjoy them and share them with as many people as you can!

[/b][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fUZcqHOrCUA][u][color=#0066cc]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fUZcqHOrCUA[/color][/u][/url]
[color=#0066cc][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKD_r5kY4bo][u]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKD_r5kY4bo[/u][/url][/color]

[b][font=Georgia][color=grey]“Failure is simply an opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.”[/color][/font]
[color=grey]Henry Ford[/color][/b]


[size=4][b]Requirements[/b][/size]
[b]Dawnguard.esm[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168][b][color=cyan]Race Compatibility for Skyrim & Dawnguard[/color][/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59220][color=cyan][b]Creating a Playable Race - Revised[/b][/color][/url]
[url=http://www.creationkit.com][color=cyan][b]Creation Kit[/b][/color][/url]
[url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/niftools/files/nifskope/1.1.3/nifskope-1.1.3.36ebfdd-windows.exe/download][color=cyan][b]NifSkope[/b][/color][/url]


This Tutorial is intended as a sequel to my earlier document entitled "Creating a Playable Race - Revised". It deals with aspects of racial creation in a greater depth than its predecessor, mainly in that it involves the addition of meshes and textures to your Custom Race. I would highly recommend using Microsoft Office to view the document - it was made with the same program. Aside from the requirements listed above, you will also need to collect meshes and textures that you wish to be specific to your Custom Race. The Tutorial lists all of the files that you will need.

I would like to thank Dragonfire12 for offering his opinion and advice regarding the information in this Tutorial - I appreciated his input very much. Natilde had also created a Tutorial that I found to be informative.  I would also like to express my gratitude to the great screenshot artists listed in the credits below - your work is wonderful, and I am grateful for your willingness to share it!

I want to also extend a special thank you to everyone who endorsed my original Tutorial "Creating a Playable Race - Revised". It is because of these endorsements that I have decided to continue creating such documents. I hope that many people benefit from this information, that you find it personally helpful, and that you [color=cyan][b][i]please remember to endorse this work.[/i][/b][/color]

I did my best to keep the same theme and format of my original work.  The steps within this lesson are all numbered for easy and specific reference in case of questions or comments.

I greatly enjoy hearing from my readers - please let me know your thoughts!  Leave your opinion regarding this material in the "Posts" section of this Page, or by all means you are always welcome to leave me a message.  I will provide steady, consistent support for this Tutorial, and will be checking the Posts frequently.

Thank you very much for downloading my work - I hope you enjoy and benefit from it!

Sincerely,

StackEmHigh


[size=4][b]Recommended[/b][/size]
Microsoft Office Word
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63179][b][color=cyan]Ayleid Sanctuary - Colour Themes[/color][/b][/url]
